maintenance: Our Bot is under maintenance. Please try again later.

errors.missing_perms: The bot is missing following permission: *{permission}*
errors.not_in_voicechannel: You are not in a voice channel!
errors.not_owned_channel_or_no_tempvoice: You are not in a temp voicechannel or this is an unowned channel!
errors.no_power_to_perform: You are missing permissions to do that!
errors.invite_creation_failed: The invitelink could not be generated!

help.name: {prefix}ban
help.description: Ban one or more given user/s by name, username#tag or @mention

help.name: {prefix}bitrate
help.description: Set the bitrate of the channel

help.name: {prefix}botinvite
help.description: Get the Invitelink of this bot

help.name: {prefix}claim
help.description: Claim the current channel when the owner is gone

donate_link.title: Donate for Little VoiceChat
donate_link.description: Click here to donate via PayPal

help.name: {prefix}donate
help.description: Get the PayPal Donation Link to donate for this bot. The servers don't pay for themselves ;)

help.name: {prefix}help [command]
help.description: Get infos about the given command

help.name: {prefix}hide
help.description: Hide the channel (so noone can see it)

invite.invite_failed: Some users could not be invited
invite.dm_message: You have been invited to Talk by *{usertag}*! {link}

help.name: {prefix}invite
help.description: This command generates an invitelink to your voicechannel

help.name: {prefix}kick
help.description: Disconnect one or more given user/s by name, username#tag or @mention

help.name: {prefix}knock
help.description: Knock on a locked or full channel owners door

language.error: The language could not be changed

help.name: {prefix}language
help.description: Set the language for your guild

help.name: {prefix}limit
help.description: Set the userlimit of your current channel

errors.not_in_vc: You are not in a Voice-Channel
errors.no_parent: This Channel does not have a parent channel

help.name: {prefix}lobby
help.description: Set the tempvoice lobby ( a voice channel to join when you want to open your own channel permissions can be managed by category changes )

dm_embed.title: Knocking by: {usertag}
dm_embed.description:
User {usertag} wants to join your channel. If your userlimit is to low or your channel is locked use:
`{prefix}unlock` or `{prefix}limit <limit>`

help.name: {prefix}lock
help.description: Lock your current channel for everyone

help.name: {prefix}moveall
help.description: With this command you can move all participants to another voice channel

prefix.error: The prefix could not be changed.

help.name: {prefix}
help.description: Set a new bot prefix for your guild.

help.name: {prefix}pushtotalk
help.description: Set Push-To-Talk for everyone enabled in your current channel

help.name: {prefix}region
help.description: Change the region of your current channel

help.name: {prefix}rename
help.description: Rename your current channels name

help.name: {prefix}show
help.description: When your channel was hided you can show it again.

help.name: {prefix}transfer
help.description: Transfer the channels ownership

help.name: {prefix}unlock
help.description: If your channel was locked you can unlock it
